I don't konw what is wrong. it would be helpful to get info on how to fix it. thanks

You are not running with the VM you think you are:

java.fullversion=GNU libgcj 3.4.1 20040831 (Red Hat 3.4.1-10)

This is the VM that is in the system path. You can tell Eclipse what VM to use
with the -vm command line option:

eclipse -vm <JAVA_HOME>/jre/bin/java

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 35995 ***
